metadata.title: Introduction to Eliassen Group & Technology Solutions
metadata.overview: Eliassen Group is organized into 3 pillars: Technology Solutions, FRCA (Financial Risk & Compliance Advisory), and Clinical Solutions. Within Technology Solutions, we help clients achieve measurable outcomes across 5 practice areas: Application Development, Cybersecurity, AI & Data Services, Infrastructure & Cloud, and Enterprise Agility.

email.subject: Technology Solutions: 35+ years delivering measurable outcomes
email.body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

Eliassen Group is organized into 3 pillars: Technology Solutions, FRCA, and Clinical Solutions. I work within the Technology Solutions pillar, where we focus on delivering measurable business outcomes across 5 practice areas:

• Application Development & Integration
• Cybersecurity
• AI & Data Services  
• Infrastructure & Cloud
• Enterprise Agility

With 35+ years of experience and 2,500 consultants supporting 400+ clients, we've built our reputation on tangible results. For example, we recently helped a financial services client reduce infrastructure costs by 40% while increasing data processing speed by 10x.

Would you be open to a 20-minute conversation about your technology priorities for this year?

Best,
[Your Name]
Eliassen Group Technology Solutions

key_talking_points: Eliassen Group has 3 pillars - Technology Solutions, FRCA, and Clinical Solutions
I work in Technology Solutions covering 5 practice areas: App Dev, Cybersecurity, AI & Data, Infrastructure & Cloud, Enterprise Agility
35+ years experience, 2,500 consultants, 400+ clients - focus on measurable business outcomes
evidence_point: Recent client reduced infrastructure costs 40% while increasing processing speed 10x
We offer flexible engagement models from talent augmentation to fully managed services
Work across financial services, healthcare, government, manufacturing
engagement_question: When you think about your technology roadmap for the next 12 months, what's the initiative that absolutely has to succeed?
voicemail: Hi [Prospect Name], this is [Your Name] from Eliassen Group Technology Solutions.
We just helped a client reduce costs by 40% while improving performance 10x.
I'd love to share how we deliver measurable technology outcomes.
Please call me back at [phone number] for a 20-minute conversation.

linkedin.connection_request: I help technology leaders deliver measurable outcomes across app dev, cybersecurity, AI/data, and cloud. Would enjoy connecting.
linkedin.inmessage_subject: Following up on Technology Solutions email
linkedin.inmessage_body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

Shot you over an email about Eliassen Group's Technology Solutions practice. We've helped clients achieve results like 40% cost reduction while improving performance 10x.

Would love 20 minutes to discuss your technology priorities.

Best,
[Your Name]

objections.objection: We already have technology partners we work with.
objections.response: That's great - we often work alongside existing partners, bringing specialized expertise to accelerate specific components. We helped one client's primary vendor complete a project 30% ahead of schedule.

objections.objection: We don't have budget for new consulting engagements.
objections.response: Many of our projects are self-funding - the cost savings we identify in first few months cover our fees. We found over $1M in operational savings for a client last quarter.

objections.objection: We prefer to handle technology initiatives internally.
objections.response: That's the goal - our most successful engagements end with your team fully self-sufficient. We often provide targeted training or specific skill sets to get critical projects over the line.
